about.title: About
about.visionMissionText:
Swiss individuals drive over 150 million kilometers in their cars per day, often with empty trunks.

Our aim at Portato is to tap into these unused transport capacities. We make ride-sharing for things easy. 

 Higher convenience for senders, additional income for drivers, less traffic polluting our environment.
about.whoWeAreText: At Portato, innovation meets the open road! We are a lively fusion of thinkers, tinkerers, and pioneers with the common goal of revolutionizing transport!

sendSection.title: Send or receive items
sendSection.description: Your affordable, convenient and eco-friendly transportation service. With Portato, you can send or receive items from the comfort of your home.

driveSection.title: Earn money while driving
driveSection.description: Start earning money by offering the empty space in your car.

Conrad.name: Conrad

Mischa.name: Mischa

Hugo.name: Hugo
Hugo.description: Franco-British engineering maestro, juggling the backend in at least as many languages.

Mehdi.name: Mehdi
Mehdi.description: Hip-hop lover and fashionista, stitching frontend and backend together like a tailor with code.

Moritz.name: Moritz
Moritz.description: Frontend guru that was born in the internet and has read and understood its T&Cs.

notificationEmail.requestConfirmationBody:
Thank you very much for your shipment request. Please find a summary of it below.
We will reach out to you soon with a suggestion for a driver who is going your way. You can manage your request at any time using this link.

Thank you for logging your trip with us! Here's a brief summary of your submission.
If we find packages that align with your route, we'll reach out to you. In the meantime, you can manage or modify your trip details using this link.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.senderQuestion: How does it work as a sender?
FAQ.senderAnswer: Simply provide details of your transportation request, including info about the item, pick-up and delivery addresses, and your preferred time frame. We'll then match you with a driver who is going a similar route. Once matched, you'll receive a notification via email.
FAQ.purchaseQuestion: I bought something on Tutti or Ricardo and have to pick it up. Can I request a pick-up through Portato?
FAQ.purchaseAnswer: Absolutely! As a 'sender', you're the one creating the transportation request. You don't necessarily need to be the person at the pick-up location. You could also be the recipient waiting for the delivery at the other end.
FAQ.feeQuestion: How much does a delivery with Portato cost?
FAQ.feeAnswer: We don't set the prices - it's up to you! As a sender, you indicate the reward you're willing to offer, which serves as a starting point for negotiation with the driver. The driver will certainly do a little detour for you, so set a price that sets a good incentive for the driver to help you.
FAQ.deliveryGuaranteeAnswer: We're still at an early stage and our community of drivers is growing. Although we can't promise coverage for every request, we're doing our best to accommodate your needs. We often drive around with our portato truck perfoming deliveries ourselves. So chances are the driver you meet is actually someone from the portato team.
FAQ.insuranceQuestion: Is my shipment insured through Portato?
FAQ.insuranceAnswer: Not at the moment through Portato. If you wish to insure your items, you'd need to make arrangements yourself. However, we made it a priority to integrate insurance soon and are actively exploring partnerships with insurance providers at the moment.
FAQ.driverQuestion: How does it work as a driver?
FAQ.driverAnswer: We're stoked you want to help! Register your route, indicating the start and end points, timing, and available space in your vehicle. Whether it's your daily commute or a one-off journey, like a holiday trip, you're all set to earn along the way.
FAQ.paymentAnswer: At present, we don't process payments directly within the app. Payment arrangements are made directly between the sender and the driver. We're actively working on incorporating a payment system for a smoother experience in the near future.
FAQ.contactQuestion: How can I get in touch with you?
FAQ.contactAnswer: We're here for you anytime! Simply use the widget on the bottom right of this screen or write us an email to info@portato.io. We're looking forward to hearing from you!

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and conditions
termsAndConditions.definitionOfTermsText: "Sender" in the context of these T&C is any user who creates a request for transportation services on this platform (Portato) and takes advantage of them for a specific price, regardless of whether that person is the sender or the recipient of the items to be transported. "Driver" in the context of these T&C is any person who provides transportation services through the use of this platform for a specific price. The term "user" in the context of these T&C refers to both senders and drivers.
termsAndConditions.termsOfUseText: The platform may only be used for the transportation of items that are allowed by applicable laws and regulations. The user must not transport any items that are illegal, dangerous, hazardous to health, or otherwise inappropriate. The platform reserves the right to block or exclude users from using the platform without giving reasons and without prior notice if these T&Cs or applicable law are violated.
termsAndConditions.contractConclusionText: Senders can create a transportation request on this platform by specifying the items to be transported, the date for transportation, and a pick-up and delivery location. Drivers can register the date and route of planned trips and thereby indicate their willingness to offer transportation services along the way. Users are obligated to provide all information that is relevant to the transportation truthfully and completely. The user is liable for damages that arise due to false or incomplete information. Neither the creation of a shipping request nor the offering of a transportation service constitutes a legally binding contract offer. Portato is not obligated to mediate a transportation request or to offer transportation services itself. However, the platform will do everything within its power to bring together users and drivers who have an interest in performing a transportation service. A transportation request is considered accepted as soon as both sender and driver confirm the transportation request. The transportation contract is concluded between the user and the driver, not between the user and the platform. The driver is obligated to transport the items carefully, deliver them punctually, and ensure that they arrive at the recipient in proper condition. The driver is liable for damages that occur during transportation, unless they are attributable to force majeure or unforeseen events. The sender is obligated to ensure a smooth transfer of items from the sender to the driver and from the driver to the recipient. The transportation contract ends as soon as the items have arrived at the recipient and the recipient has confirmed receipt without objections to the sender and Portato.
termsAndConditions.pricesAndPaymentsText: Portato does not charge a fee for using the platform. The prices for the transportation services are negotiated between the shippers and drivers before the contract is concluded. The platform has no influence on pricing and does not assume any liability for the prices. The sender is obligated to pay the agreed transportation costs to the driver before the end of the contract.
termsAndConditions.liabilityExclusionText: Portato does not accept complaints for non-performance or poor performance of transportation services and assumes no responsibility or liability for damages that may occur during the transportation of goods. The users bear the risk of damages, losses, or theft themselves. It is recommended that senders properly package and insure their items to minimize any potential damages or losses.
termsAndConditions.jurisdictionText: For any disputes arising from or in connection with the T&Cs or the use of the platform, Swiss law shall apply. The jurisdiction shall be Zurich. This applies also to lawsuits in the bill of exchange or check proceedings as well as for lawsuits due to check incidents. The platform and the user waive the right to claim jurisdiction in another court, where a court competent for the user based on residence or international private law would have to decide the dispute.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: At Portato, we prioritize the privacy of our users and are dedicated to securing your personal data. This privacy policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of your information when you engage with our platform. By utilizing Portato, you are consenting to the practices detailed in this policy.
privacyPolicy.collectionText:
We might gather the following kinds of information.

Personal data: Your personal data is collected when you voluntarily offer it to us. This may encompass details like your name, email address, and any other pertinent details when placing a transportation request or offering transportation services.

Usage data: This refers to data about your interactions with our platform. This can provide insights into the features you use, the duration of your visits, and any other pertinent diagnostic data.
privacyPolicy.useText: Your information is vital to us for several reasons: To process and confirm transportation requests; To address your feedback, queries, and requirements; To provide, sustain, and enhance our platform; And for any other purpose to which you have given consent.
privacyPolicy.sharingText: We uphold a stringent policy of not sharing your personal data with any third parties without explicit consent. However, in cases where it's essential for operational purposes such as payment processing, we might share requisite data with trusted third-party service providers. This is always done with utmost care and in compliance with data protection laws.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We employ cookies and analogous technologies to analyze your interaction with our platform and to refine the user experience. These help us understand user preferences and tailor our services accordingly.
privacyPolicy.rightsText: You possess the right to access any personal data we have amassed about you. Additionally, you can request the modification or deletion of your data, keeping in mind specific exceptions. If you wish to enact any of these rights, kindly reach out to us at info@portato.io.
privacyPolicy.updatesText: We might periodically revise this privacy policy. Whenever any modifications are made, we will ensure that you are informed by updating the policy on our platform. It's advisable to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.
privacyPolicy.contactText: For inquiries related to this policy or any other concerns, you can contact us at info@portato.io.
